subject: Added necessary pkgconfig for x11 dependency
commitMessage:
Added necessary pkgconfig for x11 dependency

Bug-Tizen: PTREL-714

Change-Id: I9d26b011d8cc9401a2066ab47a117966430fe19e
Signed-off-by: Rohit Kumar <kumar.rohit@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Code-Review-2

This ug doesn't have any direct dependency with X11. But, this ug has dependency with ui-gadget-1 which has direct dependency with X11. Hence, you don't need to modify code like this to solve the build problem.

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

just successfully built the package without your patch, I looked at PTREL-714 and you don't give much details there (error output, your current setup, gbs settings and so). 

How could I personally reproduce the reported build problem? I could not see any X11 related build break. I've tested using mobile and ivi profiles.

All I've seen was 55 warnings (that definitively needs fix) but none of them related to x11.
